title: The.Evil.Within.The.Consequence-CODEX
description:
The.Evil.Within.The.Consequence-CODEX                  

 <a href="
http://i.imgur.com/gAz1I7w.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://i.imgur.com/gAz1I7w.png</a>
                         


                         C O D E X    P R E S E N T S
     
        The Evil Within - The Consequence (c) Bethesda Softworks            

           
         Release Date :  04/2015              Protection : Steam+Custom                 
         Discs        :  1                    Genre      : Action                        

 
     
 
      Experience  survival horror  from a  new perspective  in  The  Evil
      Within: The Consequence. This is the final installment  of  a  two-
      part, story driven experience where players  take on  the  role  of
      detective Juli Kidman, Sebastian Castellanos mysterious partner, in
      a concurrent  story that  looks to  answer some  of  the  questions
      surrounding her whereabouts during The Evil Within. 

      For more infos go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/354710/
      

     
     
      - Extract
      - Burn or mount the .iso
      - Run setup.exe and install
      - Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
      - Play
   
      Notes: As the main game archive files were updated we decided to make
      this release a standalone, which includes fully updated game plus two
      big expansions:
   
      - The Consequence
      - The Assignment
     
 
      General Notes: 

      - Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
        trying to go online ..
      - If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
        to run this game with admin privileges instead
